SEARCH
Package com.financial.services.revenues

Class RevenuesHistory

java.lang.Object
com.financial.services.revenues.RevenuesHistory
public class RevenuesHistory extends Object
Utility service class responsible for maintaining a history of budget revenue states.

This class implements an "Undo" mechanism using Deque structures to store snapshots of revenue amounts and their corresponding budget types.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static Deque<Map<String,Long>>
    historyDeque
    Stack-like structure to store snapshots of revenue codes and their amounts.
    static Deque<BudgetType>
    typeDeque
    Stack-like structure to store the BudgetType associated with each history snapshot.

  • Method Details

    • getHistoryDeque

      public static Deque<Map<String,Long>> getHistoryDeque()
      Returns the full history of revenue snapshots. * @return a Deque containing maps of revenue codes and amounts

    • getTypeDeque

      public static Deque<BudgetType> getTypeDeque()
      Returns the full history of budget types processed. * @return a Deque containing the history of BudgetTypes

    • keepHistory

      public static void keepHistory(ArrayList<? extends BudgetRevenue> revenues, BudgetType type)
      Captures a snapshot of the current state of a list of revenues and adds it to the history.
      Parameters:
      revenues - the list of revenue objects to record
      type - the type of budget associated with these revenues

    • getMostRecentBudgetType

      public static BudgetType getMostRecentBudgetType()
      Retrieves the BudgetType of the most recent history entry.
      Returns:
      the most recent BudgetType, or null if history is empty

    • getMostRecentRevenuesHistory

      public static Map<String,Long> getMostRecentRevenuesHistory()
      Retrieves the revenue amount mapping from the most recent history entry.
      Returns:
      a Map of codes and amounts, or null if history is empty

    • returnToPreviousState

      public static void returnToPreviousState()
      Reverts the application state to the most recent snapshot stored in history.

      This method restores amounts for Regular, National, or Co-funded revenues and removes the restored state from the history stacks.
